title: collectionEvery
name: collectionEvery
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given collection and returns true, if all of the closure calls returns true.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(... depends on the given collection ...):boolean].

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
